body:
Hello :D

     So, i recently got Fraps (A recording software) and i filmed my first video on it. I went to upload it and the file size was over 5GB, can someone help me shrink the file size?

Thanks
-dodgy
body_tagged:
Hello :D

     So, i recently got Fraps (A recording software) and i filmed my first video on it. I went to upload it and the file size was over 5GB, can someone help me shrink the file size?

Thanks
-dodgy
title: Fraps - How do you shrink the file size?

replies.body:
Open any basic editing programm.
Look for a save or "render" option.
Render/save it at your desired setting. 
The new file should be smaller :)
replies.body_tagged:
Open any basic editing programm.
Look for a save or "render" option.
Render/save it at your desired setting. 
The new file should be smaller :)

replies.body: hehehe, that is why I use bandicam, it makes you lag less while recording and it gives smaller files :P
replies.body_tagged: hehehe, that is why I use bandicam, it makes you lag less while recording and it gives smaller files :P

replies.body: Well the youtube is saying that it will be 333 more minutes until its finished uploading.... its only 8% done :(
replies.body_tagged: Well the youtube is saying that it will be 333 more minutes until its finished uploading.... its only 8% done :(

replies.body: What I do is record in fraps, then I put it into windows movie maker and then when you're done editing, save the movie at the desired resolution.  and even if you save it in HD, the file size is still a lot smaller ;) and it uploads pretty fast on youtube (anywhere from 10-30 minutes depending on how long it is)
replies.body_tagged: What I do is record in fraps, then I put it into windows movie maker and then when you're done editing, save the movie at the desired resolution.  and even if you save it in HD, the file size is still a lot smaller ;) and it uploads pretty fast on youtube (anywhere from 10-30 minutes depending on how long it is)

replies.body:
that means its over 333 min :P
 
But it only takes that long because of your internet. How long is the video? I can tell you the usual upload speed for me and porky

reply_to.body: Well the youtube is saying that it will be 333 more minutes until its finished uploading.... its only 8% done :(
reply_to.body_tagged: Well the youtube is saying that it will be 333 more minutes until its finished uploading.... its only 8% done :(

replies.body:
Dodger, I use fraps as well.
There is no way to shrink the file size WITHIN fraps, but you can do so in your editing software.
Try rendering the videos as a lower quality file, which make the size very small.
The smaller the file size, the less it takes to upload the video.
replies.body_tagged:
Dodger, I use fraps as well.
There is no way to shrink the file size WITHIN fraps, but you can do so in your editing software.

The smaller the file size, the less it takes to upload the video.
